alert.note: Alert for Barry; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 1:51AM CDT until April 11 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Barry County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 150 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sarcoxie to near Fairview to 8 miles southwest of Wheaton to near Bella Vista, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Table Rock Lake... Roaring River State Park... Monett... Aurora... Mount Vernon... Cassville... Marionville... Shell Knob... Pierce City... Purdy... Seligman... Exeter... Wheaton... Verona... Butterfield... Washburn... Golden... Emerald Beach... Eagle Rock... Pioneer... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 33 and 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
